original_text: This is the one who was in the congregation in the wilderness with the angel who spoke to him at Mount Sinai, and with our fathers. He received living oracles to give to us.
korean_text: 시내 산에서 말하던 그 천사와 우리 조상들과 함께 광야 교회에 있었고 또 살아 있는 말씀을 받아 우리에게 주던 자가 이 사람이라

sentences.original_text: who was in the congregation in the wilderness
with the angel who spoke to him at Mount Sinai
sentences.korean_translation: 시내 산에서 그에게 말씀하신 천사와 함께
